alert.note: Alert for Pope (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 1:11PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pope County through 145 PM CDT... At 110 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Dixon Springs, or 15 miles south of Harrisburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Pope County, including the following locations... Eddyville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
